塊.definition: lump; chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc; (coll.) classifier for money and currency units

塊兒八毛.definition: one yuan or less; around 80 cents or one dollar

塊壘.definition: gloom; a lump on the heart

塊規.definition: a gauge block (block for accurate measurement)

塊體.definition: a block; body of person or animal as a block
